Name: Clint
Text: It's no use, we're completely outmatched!

Name: Clarissa
Text: What can we do against such an army!

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: You two have cause quite the reaction from Banktania.

Name: William
Text: Engineering and Nursing don't need to stand alone anymore.

Name: Clint
Text: No way! Our Bharti Brothers, the Computer Science department is here-

Name: Clarissa
Text: Be nice Clint! We need their help.

Name: Clint
Text: You're right Clarissa, they aren't real engineers anyway.

Name: Clarissa
Text: Now's not the time for your ego Clint!

Name: Clint
Text: C'mon Clarissa! We can use a bit of exam time gallows humor.

Name: Sally
Text: If you two are finished, you've been authorized to use bases!

Name: William
Text: Okay team, keep Banktania distracted. Advisor, you help Clint and Clarissa beat this guy!
